messages.subject: Sword term meaning...
messages.msgSnippet: What does the term chikara gane mean when refering to the back of menuki? On something AY translated for me decades ago he wrote, ...in the base, chikara
messages.messageBody:
What does the term "chikara gane" mean when refering to the back of menuki? On something AY translated for me decades ago he wrote, "...in the base, chikara gane comes to be used." This is a translation describing menuki from mid-Edo period. (Kinko Mino bori p.109)

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
